About.Name: Shukra Jaliya Nankabirwa
About.Currently: Software Engineer • ML + XR • Instructor & Mentor
About.AboutText: I’m a software engineer, researcher, and mentor building systems that combine local-first AI, XR learning, and interactive 3D environments. On the AI side, I develop and fine-tune course-specific language models using Apple’s MLX framework and integrate them into production-style pipelines with retrieval (RAG) and on/off-topic routing so the assistant stays aligned to lesson content. On the XR side, I design curriculum and mentor students through hands-on VR and AR projects, supporting everything from headset deployment to asset workflows and interactive experience design. I also work on digital twin and 3D room reconstruction pipelines that turn physical spaces into immersive, high-fidelity environments with accurate geometry, materials, lighting, and behavior. I care about building tools that are fast, reliable, and genuinely usable, and I enjoy teaching because it pushes me to make complex ideas clear, practical, and empowering.
